january.desc: executing precision harvesting for Potato and Mustard. AI is monitoring overnight frost risk for late-stage Chilli crops in Plot C.

february.desc: coordinating labor for Chana (Gram) and Jeera harvesting. Soil thermal modeling initiated for Summer Chilli sowing in Zaid season.

march.desc: finalizing Barley and Coriander cycles. Sarthi is analyzing market price trends to optimize the storage-vs-selling window for your harvest.

april.desc: managing post-harvest residue and preparing for Kharif cycles. Autonomous pH balancing and organic enrichment protocols active.

may.desc: misting protocols active for Mentha in Greenhouse. Staging seeds and fertilizers for June Soybean sowing to beat demand surges.

june.desc: Sowing Soybean and Cotton. My logic is tracking monsoon onset to trigger precision sowing windows based on 72-hour soil moisture predictions.

july.desc: monitoring seedling emergence in Maize and Guar fields. Pre-emptive weeding schedules set based on rain-triggered growth surges.

august.desc: triggering second-stage NPK delivery for Turmeric. AI vision models monitoring for early signs of Red Spiders in Cotton plots.

september.desc: preparing plots for Black Pepper and early Rabi Wheat. Logic analyzing soil depletion rates to calibrate base-layer fertilization.

october.desc: simultaneously managing Soybean harvest and Mustard/Chana sowing. Logic is de-conflicting equipment usage across Plot A and Plot B.

november.desc: scheduling Drip cycles for Jeera and Coriander. Night-time thermal sensors active to protect young Potato (Rabi) sprouts.

december.desc: optimizing photosynthesis rates in lower light conditions. Autonomous application of micro-nutrients to strengthen cellular resistance to December chills.

hero.desc: Sarthi AI unifies crop planning, plant health analysis, and farm resource optimization into a single season-aware intelligence system — built for Indian farming realities.

features.title: Why Choose
features.desc: Because farming today needs intelligence, not guesswork. Sarthi AI brings planning, monitoring, risk awareness, and financial clarity into one unified, season-aware platform.

health.title: Crop & Plant Health Intelligence
health.desc: Plant images, historical health records, and seasonal context are jointly analyzed. Early stress and disease risks are identified, escalated, and tracked longitudinally.

planning.title: Seasonal Planning & Risk Orchestration
planning.desc: Crop calendars, weather signals, and field constraints are synthesized. Task schedules are dynamically adjusted as risks emerge.
planning.coverage: Planner + Weather / Pest / Climate Risk Alerts

resource.title: Resource & Input Optimization
resource.desc: Water usage, input stocks, and budgets are continuously monitored. Wastage is minimized and shortages are anticipated before impact occurs.
resource.coverage: Smart Water Optimization + Inventory / Stock Management

policy.title: Policy & Opportunity Awareness
policy.desc: Government schemes, subsidies, and advisories are filtered and contextualized. Only relevant benefits are surfaced at the right stage of the season.

spotlight.title: SĀRTHI AGENTIC AI
spotlight.quote: "From soil to harvest, every signal is observed and every action is guided by an autonomous farm intelligence."
spotlight.disclaimer: Our platform delivers advisory guidance grounded in trusted public sources like ICAR and FAO, with no medical or chemical prescriptions, and includes escalation mechanisms for high‑risk scenarios.

item1.title: Intelligent Plant Health Analyzer
item1.desc: SĀRTHI AI doesn’t just detect disease from leaf images. It connects symptoms with season, weather, and crop stage before suggesting action.
item1.why: No generic treatments. Only timely, localized care.

item2.title: Longitudinal Farm Intelligence
item2.desc: Your farm is treated as a living system across seasons, not a one-time input. SĀRTHI AI learns from past crops, yields, and issues to optimize future decisions.
item2.why: Every season gets smarter than the last.

item3.title: Proactive News & Risk Awareness
item3.desc: Agricultural news, pest alerts, and policy updates are filtered for your crops and region. No noise. Only what impacts your farm.
item3.why: You react early, not after losses happen.
